name: Go Production Quality
description: Production standards for Go code following official style guide

code_style.naming: MixedCaps for exported, camelCase for unexported

prompts.code_generation:
Generate production-quality Go code for: {task}

REQUIREMENTS:
- Package documentation comment
- Function comments for exported functions
- Explicit error handling, return (result, error)
- No panic() in library code
- Table-driven tests
- Pass gofmt and golint

OUTPUT CODE ONLY.
